titleStmt.title: George O. Manchester to James W. Tate
CWG7956

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1862-1863

creation.placeName: New York City, New York County, New York

body.p:
MANCHESTER & NEMIRS,
Law Office,
114 NASSAU ST. NEW YORK.
May 13th 1863
Jas W. Tate Esqr
Asst Sec'y of State
Dear Sir

Your favor of the 8th inst, enclosing commission, came duly to hand. I suppose from the reading of the document that I am authorized to act any where within the state, and am not confined to this county -- If I am in error, please advise me. I enclose my affidavit as required,

Very respectfully
Your obd't servant
Geo O, Manchester
